Subject: John Morgan
Value: He came to the Childns Oeconomy at Buttermeer when he was about 3 Years old

Subject: John Morgan
Value: He was receiv'd into the great Boys choir Jany 9, 1797 by Br Renatus

Subject: John Morgan
Value: he now knew he should go home this time express'd also a desire after it.

Subject: John Morgan
Value: he expressed again his desire to go home
